data.id: A default ID for the widget
data.title: The title text for the popup (Optional)
data.open: Open position for popup ((Default) right, down or left)
data.contents: List of contents for each step (required only if hasYield is false)
data.hasYield: Bool, determins if content is used or not
data.isOpenOnInit: Bool, flags to open first step imediatly
data.defaultNubLeft: For open down, nub left offset, (Default is foundation's default, 22)
data.maxMobileWidth: Set a maximum width for the joyride (Default is 500)
data.closeText: The text for the close button (Default '×')
data.showOnHover: Bool, whether to open joyride on hover
